website_summaries.verdict: Extremely high price, but Dyson brand name sits at the top of the market. Very interesting open design.
pros: Provides perfect mix of quiet operation and powerful air flow
Includes a sleep timer and a remote control for full control of the fan
Can stick magnetized remote to the metal fan for easy storage
cons: Overall air movement not as powerful as blade fans

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if in California
customer_reviews.text: While the fan is great, the filter that will eventually need replacing is apparently on California ban list. Amazon won’t ship it here for hazardous reasons. But somehow the fan with the same exact filter in it ships fine.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it worked. Now it’s noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on November 27 2018. It started making this rattling noise while oscillating on December 20th. I liked the product when it worked...but now it’s just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Timmay

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money.Noiseless and efficient!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have Asthma,allergies,sinus conditions or other respiratory issues. If you have carpeting in your home. If you live in a city ,with tons of pollution. If your home is graced by the presence of pets. If you smoke in your home. If you think there is mold or mildew around . OR simply if you want to improve the air quality in your home or office....then get one.It is money well spent. Invest in your lungs....you need them to live.
customer_reviews.author: N.Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great performance
customer_reviews.text: My wife had been wanting a Dyson tower fan for some time. When we saw this purifier at a discounted price we decided to try it. We couldn't be happier. It moves a lot of air and we really like the 10-speed control. This is my first Dyson product and I think it is worth the price given the quality and performance. To be fair to Dyson they will price match, but I still ordered from Amazon to take advantage of their Smile contribution.
customer_reviews.author: madjohn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: This fan justifies its price. I have a studio loft with just about 1000 sqft. I used less A/C when I have this fan put to work. It’s stylish and powerful. Best investment I’ve made. Also, I can put it on a schedule and I can control it with my phone. So handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing so far...
customer_reviews.text: Don't think it's worth it...doesn't refresh the room that much...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it then take care of the filters.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fan. It is a very expensive fan. However, it does have a very small footprint so it fits neatly in our narrow hallway and the dogs don't go blasting through it like they did with the old box fan. The magnetic remote is very easy to knock off. I have lost count how many times I've had to pick it up because 1 of the 3 dogs brushed by it. However, being disabled it is so nice to be able to remotely turn on the fan from out in the living room and get cooler air from that side of the house. The filters are expensive but there are less expensive options for this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Pait

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on QVC for $339 plus it came with an extra filter.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cool but Doesn't Cool
customer_reviews.text: Having stood in relief before similar Dyson fans at Target during summers past, I thought springing for this one would be a great idea. My daughters' room is the hottest in the house and their box fan wasn't cutting it. So we sprung $500 for this thing, aaaand... it does a better job at cleaning the air than cooling it. We're STILL running the box fan in addition to the Dyson. :-\
customer_reviews.author: northoakjr@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: For $400 I have clean sinuses my chest congestion relief . Never realize how much dirt and dust you have in your house in cap for until you see it on the outside of the machine the Dyson that works well if you download the 2.4 gigahertz the Machine Works quite well and you can monitor everything on your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: This thing really keeps the air clean. Recommend for use in the living room, master bedroom, and such. The air can also be very strong on the maximum setting. You can use it as a very good fan when you want to. The app interface to control this thing is nice and you can monitor your house air quality well. You can definitely feel the clean air.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Accurately senses changes in the environment
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Dyson air purifier/fan on Amazon Prime Day, and we've been really impressed with it. Most of the time, we have "good" air quality in our home, represented with the green color in the app. But the purifier has been able to sense environmental changes. For example, when we used bleach to clean the washing machine and cleaned out its filter, the air purifier immediately changed to a "Fair" air quality and started cleaning the air. As for the fan, it's gives you a nice, cool breeze, and you don't have to worry about kids' little fingers trying to stick themselves into blades like you usually would.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Great Dyson product as usual.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Dyson nut! Resisted for years! But now I’m a believer! I do love this fan and the ability to control it with Alexa, however, Alexa only seems to be able to handle connection to 1 fan. I tried to connect 2, but Alexa was constantly asking me which fan. Even when I labeled them as fan 1 and fan 2, when I gave a command, Alexa would say,”Which fan are you talking about? Say 1 for fan 1 and 2 for fan 2.” Ended up returning second fan due to a noise issue and frankly won’t replace it due to this issue. I hope they work it out.
customer_reviews.author: K Lyn

customer_reviews.title: App connectivity doesn’t work, horrible support.
customer_reviews.text: I just unboxed this in time for warmer weather, and have been very frustrated with the App & connectivity that Dyson insists we use. First the App could not connect to their servers, then a couple hours later it worked, but the App cannot talk to the fan. By now their support line is closed, and their chat line was less than useless, asking ME what the colors on the fan meant! It’s pointless to offer a chat line if all they recommend is reboot the router! I have no idea if the fan actually works as advertised, but I am inclined to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mount

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it for the summer fan
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Looks -Has a remote -Has oscillation feature -Timer for night -Wide range of airflow in width and height Cons: -Even at the highest setting, air flow is not as high as a regular fan -At the highest setting, it is noisy for the amount of air it is producing -Fan have to work extra hard sucking air through a filter as if you are running with a mask on. Conclusion: -It is an air purifier /circulator with a mild fan. Environmental air is pretty clean nowadays due to lack of drivers, so if you are looking for a strong & quiet air flow, I would suggest getting something else.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Fan and Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our Dyson Air purifier. The fan is strong and quiet on lower settings. It is a bit loud to sleep with it above 7/8. I love the Dyson App! I am able to check the air quality inside and outside of our home and operate the purifier from my phone. Very easy. Although it is called the "Pure Cool Link", you should know that this is an air purifier and a fan. It is in no way a replacement for air conditioning. Thankful to Amazon for shipping it to us quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier, low noise!
customer_reviews.text: We discovered our daughter is allergic to dogs and since we own dogs they told us to purchase an air purifier. I did a lot of research and it seemed like the most important part was not to have an ozone generating machine, followed by having a HEPA filter and if it was to be setup in the bedroom low noise. This purifier has it all! Easy to use, very silent (has night mode), can be controlled from your phone, can be set into auto and will detect air quality in the room. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an air purifier that blows some air, not a fan with a purifier.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a fan. It's an air purifier that blows some air. It's not powerful enough to circulate a small room unless it's on the second to highest setting and that setting is really loud! The purifier works well and I've to to admit, the auto-purifier feature works perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: LeTronique

customer_reviews.title: Buy into the hype
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge on a Dyson to satisfy my own curiosity. I've always heard great things but who wants to spend 200+ on a fan? It's definitely worth the hype. The fan displaces a good amount of air and great adjust-ability. It can move some good air quietly, or blast your room with the sound of a turbine engine. Haven't had it long enough to change the filter, but I will admit, I don't look forward to buying a $60 filter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: When I first turned it on it took the whole day before the air quality in my house was good. I let it run constantly
customer_reviews.text: Wow! When I first turned it on it took the whole day before the air quality in my house was good. I let it run constantly. I like the app for the phone. It gives you all kinds of stats. I have two cats and this thing is making it easy to breath at home. What's even better is I can control it with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bed

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent air purifier, the finish are amazing and very easy to use even without reading the manual. It is very quiet and barely hear the motor sound in the midnight. I couldn't be happier. The air quality has been improved by using dyson air purifier, my nasal allergy issue is totally alleviated and I know that. There is one thing I didn't expect is that the filter life is not as long as what they stated. Be ware that consumable will cost you $70 bucks each time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Tao

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi is useless
customer_reviews.text: Wifi is virtually useless and technically not ready to be released to the public.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: More than a little disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected to feel a 300.00 fan across the room a bit more but I barely feel this one running at 10. While I do like the phone app and Alexa control I could have bought a regular fan with 3 times the CFM output for A LOT LESS Unless I got a lemon
customer_reviews.author: T. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Was damaged and no remote control
customer_reviews.text: the plug was bend that it cannot plugged in. So I returned. They refund very fast by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Moonyoung Oh

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect purifier to phone app.
customer_reviews.text: after connecting the phone app onto the purifier's wifi and typing the purifier's wifi's password, the app gets stuck at confirming connection with the purple loading bar stuck mid way. It then says "slow response, would you like to continue?" i clicked continue. and it loads for another 2 minutes, then the slow response window pops up again on the phone app, again asking me "would you like to continue"? At this point, i said "yes, continue. continue with the amazon faulty product return process please".
customer_reviews.author: mq

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product. Can easily be controlled using a cell phone as well as the control provided by oem. Another positive note: this fan can monitor air quality in the room.
customer_reviews.author: alfonso orrantia

customer_reviews.title: Improves Air Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wherever I put this fan, I can tell that the air quality improves. I have a dog and a cat, and their dander gets everywhere. I sometimes wake up stuffy because of it, but since I've added this fan to my bedroom, this problem has almost completely disappeared!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cool air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been suffering from seasonal allergies and air purifiers can be a life saver for me. This Pure Cool Link gets the job done in a minimal, modern design. No matter where you put it, it can circulate clean air throughout the entire room. It has an app you can download to control the unit. It also comes with a small remote that you can you use when you don’t have access to your smartphone or tablet. It’s pretty quiet when it’s working. If you’re looking for an efficient, high-tech air purifier Dyson is a good option for you. It’s pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: smhlevi

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have no basis to compare. It's an amazing air purifier. I bought Targets best, both of them. This thing has a brain of it's own. Bought it for my son, and is still solely used in his room, he hasn't had a bad asthma allergy cough since... Its been 3 months and we live in KS, one if the worst states for allergies. I give it a 2 Thumbs Up, where do I sign up at, seal of approval. Thank You Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: A Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty loud
customer_reviews.text: A bit louder than advertised like 40-50 decibels at only half speed so I can't really use it at full speed at night not as happy with it as I'd like to be
customer_reviews.author: Waffle_3113

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit pricey, but it worth it. It is very quiet which was very important for us since one of our pups is terrified of any “strange” noise. This this product she actually lays in front of it when she is hot. It is very light and easy to take from one room to another. I would recommend it to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: T. Crowl

customer_reviews.title: Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. The model is excellent but the air when compared with a regular fan is less if i use high speed 10 then it sounds same as regular fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sampath

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product. It was easy to set up; beautiful to look at and had all of the fun digital app connections to check on the air quality in my room. I have a Dyson animal vacuum cleaner and love it. No vauum clean can compare. One of the best companies out there with superior products.
customer_reviews.author: mona glenn

customer_reviews.title: Well designed quiet and easy to clean fan
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and well designed fan that is easy to clean. After 3 months of use, so far so good. The only negative would be the high cost. Now for the test of time...
customer_reviews.author: Masashi O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in a tropical climate
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the Dyson Pure Cool purifier I got for the Living Room that I got another one for the Bedroom. It’s quiet and effective. Better breathing makes for a better night of sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Trantum

customer_reviews.title: Helped my asthma!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped wheezing at night thanks to Dyson! I'm glad I invested in this slick air filter, and the night mode is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Peterkin

customer_reviews.title: High-pitched Noise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Dyson Pure Cool Link TP02 directly from Amazon.com. It was working great for 17 months. Then, it started making a high-pitched noise, even with a brand new filter. Dyson Support has sent me a replacement TP04 - I will update this review if this one ends up with the same issue, as my other Dyson DP04 has had the exact same issue.
customer_reviews.author: JR Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: No filter replacements available anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love the fan but you can't get replacement filters anymore so it makes this super expensive fan useless. I've been waiting for 5 months for them to refill their stock. I finally got a replacement filter and ordered a few so I wouldn't need it right away next time. Now I keep a back stock just in case. I recommend others do the same. Otherwise the fan is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: It’s really loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s really loud. The wind isn’t that cold... Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: jingxuanliu

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dyson fans. 2 with a heat option and this new one to help circulate air in a large living room with fireplace. Love the color, height and the circulation patterns. This one does not heat but a great fan would absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CT_P

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The app is great, let you track all day air quality and the machine runs very quiet. You can tell the difference that the air is cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: AGBB

customer_reviews.title: Not a FAN
customer_reviews.text: Much to noisy when oscillating very disappointed in Dyson. I own several of their products which are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore puma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No problem with delivery. Arrived on time as promised. I love this HEPA filter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to, easy to set up. Use a 2.4Ghz WiFi connection to connect, not 5G.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Almond

customer_reviews.title: Our family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves it! Good for home with kids. Noise is nearly non- existent. Works with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Aniket

customer_reviews.title: It’s Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had it a week. I enjoy it. No problems. Shoots air a good few yards(meters) on high. It has a silent feature which works. Very quiet and light breezes. However I’m a sleeper who likes a loud fan so the higher settings are nice. Fave feature is a timer for setting it to turn off after your asleep. It’s nice. Great buy. Also can control with Siri and Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Mask Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Always like Dyson even though they are pricy. We do a lot of cooking at home and needed clean air inside the house. Have at it for a few weeks and so far it is doing its job. No more cooking odours.
customer_reviews.author: ALL4MANU

customer_reviews.title: Great filter, good looking fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love that we are getting filtered air, and this thing looks great in the living room. Love the auto oscillate and speed. Could be quieter at level 10, but 9 and lower are just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely one of the amazing home gadgets for lazy people like me
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and outfitted with WIFI capabilities bring so much convenience for me. It is definitely one of the amazing home gadgets for lazy people like me! I don’t have to manually turn it on and off or constantly check the filters to ensure they are clean; instead, I can just lie down on the couch, operate and keep tabs from my phone! How amazing it is !
customer_reviews.author: KAN

customer_reviews.title: Great tech and really cleans the air!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite recent tech purchases as it has dramatically reduced airborne particles such as pollen, dander, and any other air impurities, and it's got a great mobile app. I've been able to breath better since putting this unit in our family room.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Fan reduced my allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bedroom, there is a setting for night so it is quieter and lower light (though truly I find the sound soothing for sleep). I used to get very conjested at night but not since purchasing and using this Dyson Air Purifier. I also find the app very easy to use and it can rate the quality of the air in my room. Love it and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Powell

customer_reviews.title: Came in its own box
customer_reviews.text: There is no complain regarding the Dyson. It's refurbished but working perfectly. Everything was included with remote control and manual booklet. The only thing is the packaging was a little unpleasant. Tapes wasn't too secure nor there was no "handle with care" sign. I was a little worried when I saw the package but gladly there was no damage to my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Lingling Anh

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love that it shows you what your air quality is in the room. It was easy to put together and connect to WiFi. Make sure you have the right password or it won’t connect. Keeps the room cool if you leave on high.
customer_reviews.author: N.Meck

customer_reviews.title: Smells still lingered
customer_reviews.text: Was not a great purifying fan, didnt get rid of smells and it got pretty loud on highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Klb334

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy direct from Dyson next time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in apparent mint condition. It arrived fully used with what looked like 3 years worth of wear and tear. The prongs were all chewed up and the filter clearly belonged to a stranger. They refused to provide a replacement. Probably the worst ecommerce experience I’ve had since using amazon.
customer_reviews.author: inna braude

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I have this running every day because of allergies and it oscillates air and has ac also. Keeps the room cozy and at night the noise level can be turned down and does not interfere with sleep. My puppy sleeps in front of it when it’s really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Effective and beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Dyson air purifier a few days after the Campground fire in California had started. We live in the Bay Area and the air was horrible. We had the unit running 24/7 and it kept our one story 2000 sqf home at a safe air quality level.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Clean air! Best your money can buy these days is clean air and water. I recommend this item to everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Shervin Golriz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, we absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and effective. I have a device to show us the quality of the air in the house. We have 2 different brands. The Dyson is much faster in Cleaning the air from the smoke pollution.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Remote battery arrives dead.
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe the money I spent on this machine for it to arrive with a dead battery in the remote. They should be embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Came without a filter or lint trap cover
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get the fan, only to find it has no filter, yet I bought it new. Also missing the lint filter cover! Not pleased with my product especially for the amount it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Naota101

customer_reviews.title: noisier than I expected, but very effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It is a bit noisier than I would have expected, but it does a great job cooling my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: mosaicmuse

customer_reviews.title: Works well,doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: First week. Works really well. Wish they had cleanable filters though. It’s expensive enough but does what we had hoped it would do
customer_reviews.author: inthewind

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this fan is that it constantly loses connection with Alexa. There are some Application issues but overall all I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: This has been great to keep my in room and I move down ...
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma and also have dogs. This has been great to keep my in room and I move down the hall to my office during the days. I run it constantly and have noticed a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great purifier and fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a great price (sub 270$) on amazon and very happy with it. Not sure I would spend 400$ on it, but definitely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed this to use in a musty cabin. Love the night setting and that it doubles as a fan in the summer. It’s produces a pleasant white noise for those who need some to get to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen & Joanna Thomasma

customer_reviews.title: light, cooling and sleek
customer_reviews.text: this fan is so light to move, very quiet yet cool... and looks nice. worth every penney!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a high low button on the machine and not just the remote. Easy cleaning because of the open design, quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Sfgal

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Nuff Said
customer_reviews.text: Dyson makes amazing products, if you own any Dyson Products You already know how great they are. Quiet, High Powered, Control with your phone. Must Buy
customer_reviews.author: John Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Cool link Dyson fan
customer_reviews.text: I love my cool link fan. I would say the only complaint is the price point on the filters. It’s worth it though if you have allergies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love that this automatically turns of when the air quality in the room is not great! It really works well!
customer_reviews.author: Meira

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing I EVER bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I EVER bought. Enough so, that I bought a second one since we have two floors. They react to odors and bad air almost immediately. Since getting this, my allergies have all but disappeared. Best money I've spent on a filter. The design is attractive and fits into our interior design.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These work amazingly well. After ordering our first one we ordered a second on to place in our bedroom and are thinking of ordering one more for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Quite and efficient tower fan
customer_reviews.text: Very few parts to assemble, love have no blades with the kids around. The sound is undetectable on the lower settings, but even at the highest settings still quitier than a traditional tower fan. We arl have to see how they stand up to the tast of time. Western Washington so maybe 5 months of full on fan usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Sync with Google Home Pls!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My two pieces of feedback are that 1.) I wish it could sync with Google Home the way it does with Alexa and Siri, and 2.) The noise level could be slightly quieter. I am a light sleeper and it has never been so loud to disturb my sleep. #1 is a wish. #2 is very minor.
customer_reviews.author: JT R

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has really helped with allergy symptoms from sleeping with a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how we went without this before! Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm
customer_reviews.text: Great for regular air circulation as well as those cold days. This heater works amazing for a master bed room.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Look I know it’s expensive, but it’s 100000% worth it! I love how you can control via the Dyson app and how it is also a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my new Air purifier. Works as expected. Air quality has greatly improved and my allergies are not acting up.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Install
customer_reviews.text: Great Dyson product, I love it, very easy to install and set up with Alexa
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Didier

customer_reviews.title: Asthma sufferer
customer_reviews.text: I have asthmatic episodes almost every 3 months or so. This has been so good for me. I haven’t had an episode since getting it. If you have asthma, I’d give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: If the air quality is poor, the device is very loud
customer_reviews.text: If the air quality is poor, the device is very loud. Other than that I have no complaints about it, works great at keeping the air clean in the house and is helping out majorly with my allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Works great - only issue is with pairing to phone
customer_reviews.text: This model was unable to connect to my phone (Samsung 7), but other than that, it has been functioning well after 3 months. I love the white noise of it too, helps me sleep through the night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Not that great a air filtering or the amount of force the air blows at. Cheap build. Really only a 50$ value at best, your paying for the Dyson name.
customer_reviews.author: kaila sorrells

customer_reviews.title: Dyson is worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Sleek design. App is easy to install and use. The auto setting is nice. It’s cool to be able to control it from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the air nicely i’m my bedroom Nice to have a break from the pollin
customer_reviews.author: Spending_Problem

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and the app makes it possible ...
customer_reviews.text: Life changer. Super easy to use and the app makes it possible to control and monitor air quality even when you are not home. Highly recommend it. Easy to install and set up. Lighter than the older models too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Love Dyson Products
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our asthmatic cat. He has fewer episodes now. This product is very lightweight and easy to move from room to room. Offers a pleasant white noise in addition to cleaning our air. Its small footprint makes it simple to place anywhere. Uncomplicated assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Looper

customer_reviews.title: Dysentery fan purifiers
customer_reviews.text: When this fan rotates it shakes. I have two of these & one doesn’t have this issue. Wha t do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Kay Heaton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This refubished product has some problem as Error code... omg
customer_reviews.author: Hyerin Gim

customer_reviews.title: My $30 tower fan cools more effectively
customer_reviews.text: App is great! Love the automatic settings and tracked air quality statistics. The fan itself isn't super impressive beyond the form factor. It doesn't cool nearly as well as my other tower fan or my oscillating fan.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysta Collins

customer_reviews.title: no more dander
customer_reviews.text: I think this thing is really helping rid the air of dander because my husband hasn't had to cough much since we got it. Really impressed and I do love the strength of the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Great Clarifier so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've had now for a couple of weeks running the unit around 5 and you can tell the difference in air quality. Much cleaner and seems crisper, no odor. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: dannyboy

customer_reviews.title: brand value
customer_reviews.text: i like it thats why i bought 3 set for all rooms
customer_reviews.author: LEE K.

customer_reviews.title: Unsurpassed quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson products. Great manufacture, great support and warranty service, and every product I've owned had performed much better than expected. Especially used/pre-owned products.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Prince

customer_reviews.title: Nice aire cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my house, because I have lots of allergy problem and have 4 dogs in the house. I put it up in my bedroom, I can feel the different of the air quality at night. Really glad to have bought it. Hope it will keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: TH Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this fan. Total life saver at night when we need keep air circulating in our bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Glorified fan
customer_reviews.text: Does not actually cool air. Not equivalent to an ac unit
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shackleford

product_meta.title: Dyson Pure Cool Link TP02 Wi-Fi Enabled Air Purifier, White/Silver
product_meta.description: Style Name:Pure Cool Link / TP02| Design:PurifierThe Dyson Pure Cool Link purifier fan automatically removes 99.97 percent of allergens and pollutants as small as 0.3 microns such as pollen, bacteria and pet dander from your home. The 360 degree, vacuum-sealed glass HEPA filter removes indoor air pollutants while a second layer of activated carbon captures household odors and potentially harmful toxins such as paint fumes. Purifies all year round cools you as a fan in summer. Intelligent purification automatically monitors, reacts and purifies - then reports the air quality data to your Dyson link app, so you can remotely control your environment– standard data and messaging rates may apply. The night-time mode monitors, reacts and purifies, but only using the quiet settings and the LED display dims – for no disturbance for light sleepers. Easy filter change - rather than washing a filter every month, just replace it after a year of using it for 12 hours every day with Dyson Pure Cool Link replacement filters. 2 year warranty on parts and labor (excludes filter).
feature_bullets: Dual Functionality: Purifies all year, cools you as a fan in summer; HEPA filter automatically removes 99.97 percent of allergens and pollutants as small as 0.3 microns including pollen, dust, mold spores, bacteria and pet dander from your home; Now works with Amazon Alexa
Dyson technology helps create a cleaner, healthier home - Our vacuums and purifiers are scientifically proven to capture particles as small as allergens and bacteria.

Second layer in filter contains activated carbon to capture household odors and volatile organic compounds like paint fumes, certified asthma and allergy friendly and awarded the quiet mark accreditation

Automatically monitors and reacts; Dyson Link app provides real time air quality reports and allows you to remotely control your machine from your smartphone standard data and messaging rates may apply
Features include night time mode, sleep timer, and an easy to clean aperture with no fast spinning blades so it’s safe for little fingers or paws

Other features include oscillation, 10 airspeed settings and automatic shut off if machine is tipped over; and no fast spinning blades so it’s safe for little fingers or paws; Refer to the PDF attached below in technical specification for user manual

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars731 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 2 year warranty on parts and labor. Excludes filter.
